mapper.insert: insert into user(id, username, password, email, birthday, nikename, createdtime) values (#{id},#{username},#{password},#{email},#{birthday},#{nikename},#{createdtime})
mapper.select: select * from user where username = #{0} and password = #{1}
mapper.update: update user set username=#{username}, password=#{password}, email=#{email}, birthday=#{birthday}, nikename=#{nikename} where id=#{id}
